snippet.title: Half-Line Miami Release Trailer (available for free download)
snippet.description:
DOWNLOAD HALF-LINE MIAMI HERE:
http://stabberthomas.itch.io/HLM

 Half-Line Miami is a video game mashup between Half-Life 2 and Hotline Miami.

I made this game as a declaration of my love for these 2 games, and as an experiment in game design.

Comes with a level editor, more maps can be shared at
http://www.reddit.com/r/HLM

PROGRAMMING/ART BY: Thomas Kole
http://www.thomaskole.com

MUSIC BY: SUNG
https://soundcloud.com/sung_music

MADE AT: DIGITIAL ARTS and ENTERTAINMENT
(videogame development and VFX school)
http://digitalartsandentertainment.be/

programming help:
David Goosen
